20101215074157.250|20101215074158.500|CCO|THERE ARE AT LEAST 150 PILL 
20101215074158.500|20101215074159.750|CCO|MILLS OPERATING IN THE CITY,

20101215074201.000|20101215074202.667|CCO|PRESCRIPTIONS FOR THE POWERFUL

20101215074209.333|20101215074211.000|CCO|>> Reporter: AND JUST LIKE THE 
20101215074211.000|20101215074212.111|CCO|MOVIE SAYS, IF YOU BUILD IT,

20101215074214.333|20101215074215.444|CCO|>> Reporter: ALONG WITH BILL, WE

20101215074216.556|20101215074217.667|CCO|VARIOUS PAIN CLINICS AROUND THE 
20101215074217.667|20101215074218.778|CCO|CITY.
